title: Goth Girl and the Sinister Symphony
author: Chris Riddell
description: The fourth book in the  series. In this installment, Ada Goth’s father —  — is organizing a music festival at . Meanwhile Ada juggles distracting events: her grandmother picking potential wives for her father, a faun hiding in her wardrobe, and shady plots from the estate’s manager. Featuring dark humor, spooky‑gothic charm, and the author’s signature black‑and‑white illustrations, this is a fun fantasy‑mystery filled with puns, quirky characters, and musical mayhem. 224 pages.
